DtScriptedTaskMetaData.myDescription: Allows or disallows entities to cross the street using this crosswalk.

myVariables.item: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes" ?> <!DOCTYPE boost_serialization> <boost_serialization signature="serialization::archive" version="9"> <DtScriptedTaskVariable class_id="0" tracking_level="0" version="3"> <myVariableName>allow</myVariableName> <myType>checkbox</myType> <myLabel>Allow Crossing</myLabel> <myToolTip></myToolTip> <myDefaultValue>1</myDefaultValue> <myRangeBottom>-100000</myRangeBottom> <myRangeTop>100000</myRangeTop> <myVariableData></myVariableData> <myVisible>1</myVisible> <myIndent>0</myIndent> <myInternal>0</myInternal> </DtScriptedTaskVariable>
